channel.title: How do I get it so that when you wield a 2her it takes off the shield?
channel.description: Okay well I added d claws, d kite and elysian shield but when I wield the d claws all it says is that I can't wear a 2h weapon with a shield and does nothign else. I want it so that is takes off the shield, how?

item.title: How do I get it so that when you wield a 2her it takes off the shield?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Search this in your client class -

int[] two_hand

You should get something like this -

int[] two_hand = {841, 6609, 1319, 4718, 4726, 1409, 4710, 7158, 8100, 3204, 4755, 4153, 4827,667,35,2402,746, 6528,843,845,849,847,853,851,859,857,861, 4734,4214,4215,4216,4217,4218,4219,4220,4221,4222,4223, 4747 }; for (int element : two_hand) { if ((wearID == element) && (playerEquipment[playerShield] > 0)) { if (playerHasItem(-1)) { addItem(playerEquipment[playerShield], 1); playerEquipment[playerShield] = -1; playerEquipmentN[playerShield] = 0; setEquipment(-1, 0, playerShield); } else { sM("Not enough space in your inventory."); return false; } }
Add your dragon claw item ID in there.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I get it so that when you wield a 2her it takes off the shield?
